title: BS 7354: 1990 Design of High Voltage Open Terminal Substations. There is a special section giving guidance on the design of EHV substation earthing
Code of Practice for Earthing. European Standards (1) prHN 50179 Power Installations Exceeding 1 kV a.c., Common Rules. This is a harmonisation document and Chapter 9 deals with Earthing
Directives concerning the protection of telecommunication lines against harmful effects from electric power and electrified railway lines
Testing of Soil, Soil Resistivity and Electrode Resistance
IEEE Standard 80, 1986 Guide for Safety in AC Substation Grounding

container-title: 2) IEC 61936-1 Power Installations exceeding 11 kV a.c. and 1.5 kV d.c. System engineering and erection of electrical power installation, particularly concerning safety aspects. Draft being developed
title: Guide for Generating Station Grounding. International Standards (1) IEC 479 The Effects of current and human beings and livestock. This standard is internationally recognised and forms the basis of calculation for estimating safe touch, step and transfer potentials
Relevant legislative documents (1) HSE booklet Memorandum of guidance on the Electricity at Work Regulations

note: The Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 1994 (known as the CDM Regulations).
